Title: Icy Ink
Description: The icy beasts in the frozen biomes excrete a very rare and mysterious liquid. The liquid's properties make it the perfect binding agent for our inks. I'm a southpaw so the prospect of not smudging my page is very exciting to me.
ObjectivesText: Gather 20 Icy Excrement from the ice spiders and ice bears of the Dragon Isles for Dothenos of the Valdrakken Accord.
